name: Aughild's Spike
flavorText: A detailed recreation of the ceremonial helmet Aughild used when he was crowned king of Entsteig.
flavorTextHtml: A detailed recreation of the ceremonial helmet Aughild used when he was crowned king of Entsteig.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduces damage taken by 15%.    
 Increases damage dealt by 30%.(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from elites by 30.0%    
 Increases damage against elites by 30.0%
